diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $AQ$ is $3+x$ units.
The length of the line $PQ$ is $6-x$ units.
The length of the line $RQ$ is $6+x$ units.
The length of the line $QT$ is $3$ units.
Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $P$.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $A$.
Point $Q$ also lies on the line connecting $A$ and $T$.
Point $D$ also lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
The line $PT$ is parallel to the line $SR$.
line_instances: There are lines $PQ$, $PT$, $QT$, forming a triangle $PQT$.
There are lines $RD$, $RP$, $RQ$, $RS$, forming a figure $RPQR$.
There are lines $SQ$, $ST$, forming a figure $SQTR$.
